text:
President Biden’s war on domestic energy production is hurting every family in Illinois and throughout America. 
https://t.co/GTNYOCmOAP

I am proud to receive the 2022 Alzheimer’s Impact Movement Humanitarian Award from the @alzassociation. Alzheimer’s impacts so many across Illinois. I will continue to advocate for policies that enhance innovation of cures, ensure robust access to care, and support caregivers. https://t.co/OctMKvNsnz
Thanks to Ryan Hubbard from @ABATEofIllinois for stopping by in DC today to talk motorcycle rights and safety. I am proud to support Illinois motorcyclists in Congress. https://t.co/wQeTYVPyBc

Illinois families are feeling the pain at the pump as gas prices hit a record high. 

It’s past time for President Biden to end his war on America’s energy sector and unleash our energy independence to reduce costs for consumers.
https://t.co/woKN8uQfPC

On Peace Officers Memorial Day, we honor law enforcement officials who have died or been injured in the line of duty. Thank you to police officers and their families across Illinois who keep our communities safe. https://t.co/pevHWdzdy7

China presents growing economic and national security challenges. At the first meeting of the Conference Committee negotiating legislation on China, I emphasized the need for the United States to lead on trade policy to strengthen our competitiveness. https://t.co/zFYt4Dxiyb

Congrats to Chatham Glenwood High School graduate and Illinois native Reid Detmers on throwing a no-hitter for the Los Angeles Angels last night! #IL18 
https://t.co/H4UNbFDz9N

If we are serious about countering China’s economic aggression, America must lead on trade. I joined my @WaysandMeansGOP colleagues @RepCarolMiller & @RepAdrianSmith to underscore the importance of US leadership on trade at the first meeting of the Conference Committee on China. https://t.co/iRm1m2C2EU

I visited with United Counties Council of Illinois members from #IL18 this week. We discussed issues impacting counties, including inflation, economic development, and rural broadband. I appreciate their advocacy for local communities in Illinois. https://t.co/Cl6szGcBs3
